stable.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
stable.bodyMarkdown:
### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`7b25a84`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/7b25a84c08d3b1903814a99c5a32f20dca33729e) - **shizuku**: crash when processing +~1MB thumbnail files *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`0558f98`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0558f98b2b67dd7aba9e3178fc43ae7b9966a2fa) - **shizuku**: automatically create non-existing directories *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`7b25a84`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/7b25a84c08d3b1903814a99c5a32f20dca33729e) - **shizuku**: crash when processing +~1MB thumbnail files *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
